overview:
“IP Commerce founder and CEO Chip Kahn exemplifies entrepreneurialism, with an impressive track record of identifying business opportunities and developing innovative strategies to address market needs. Kahn has led the growth of IP Commerce for the past three years.

Prior to IP Commerce, Kahn founded and developed several successful companies, including Inventure Partners, a venture enterprise group that owns a portfolio of companies; Amigo Systems, Inc., a payment services provider; Application Media, a broadband media and commerce consultancy; and STS Hotel Net, an integrated media supplier. Kahn also serves on the advisory board for BroadHop, Inc., a broadband services software company. He is a frequent keynote speaker at industry conferences and was recognized as one of Coloradoâ€™s up-and-coming business leaders in 2002 with the â€œ40 under 40â€ Award, and more recently as semi-finalist for Ernst & Youngâ€™s Entrepreneur of the Year award. Kahn holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration from Colorado State University.”

(Source: IP Commerce)
